column4: ok QUestion: I just formated an hdd (used gparter) and mounted it. but the hdd seems to be blocked or somerhing and i canot create folder or copy on it. why is that?
did u make format it into ext2 or 3?
or did u just format it...cuz if u did that its unallocated space...u need to format it into something like ext2or3 which is linux filesystem
well i use 2 so try 2 lol :/ dunno whatelse to say
